columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the aggregation object.

columns.name: authorized_account_id
columns.description: The 12-digit account ID of the account authorized to aggregate data.

columns.name: authorized_aws_region
columns.description: The region authorized to collect aggregated data.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The time stamp when the aggregation authorization was created.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags attached to the Cluster.
